ingredients.item: 1 handful coriander, stalks finelychopped, leaves left whole
30g fresh root ginger, cut into matchsticks
½ x 25g pack Thai basil, leaves picked
½ x 25g pack mint, leaves picked

instructions.step: In a bowl, mix the pork, salad onions, garlic, coriander stalks and ½ tbsp honey; season. Shape into 8 patties; set aside.

In a pan, bring the fish sauce, vinegar, ginger, chilli, lemon grass, lime zest and juice, remaining 1½ tbsp honey and 100ml water to the boil; simmer for 3-4 minutes. Set aside in a serving bowl. Cook the noodles according to pack instructions and set aside.

Brush the patties with a little oil, then griddle over a high heat for 10 minutes, turning regularly. Arrange the lettuce, carrot, cucumber, herbs, noodles and dipping sauce on a plate with the cooked patties.
